ygData.subject: Re: Frezslice the shaman
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You know, you could have simply asked a higher level player to get your corpse, it would be easy to find someone who would. Hell, a 5th level Druid or
ygData.messageBody:
--- EQCheats@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> From: "(Ralph) Clay <wolffmanus@...>" <wolffmanus@...>
> Subject: Frezslice the shaman
>
> I just though I would drop a not that I just pinged 14th last night
> (I know some of you blast thru levels like a missle but I only play
> about an hour or so a day). The highest level I have got to so far is
> 15th as a Elf Pally then I got killed in the middle of a high level
> Orc camp and was unable to recover my body (O' well , I like Shamans

You know, you could have simply asked a higher level player to get your
corpse, it would be easy to find someone who would. Hell, a 5th level Druid
or fourth level Enchanter could have retrieved it. You could even have MADE
an enchanter, gotten her to fourth level in about an hour, and invised her to
drag it out. You can drag your own corpses with alts if you consent them, of
course.

> better anyways lol). Anyways Ias asking where is the best places to

I have a toon of every class and race, and Paladin seems the most useless,
except for rezzing. They get the worst spells of any hybrid class.

> hunt / get good drops for a 14th level Bar. shaman.

You should go play in Paludal Caverns by 14th level, it has a higher
experience bonus than anywhere else in the game at any level. You should be
able to level every couple of hours.

I think you have cure disease, in which case you can go hunt Fiends.
Otherwise you should join a Bandit group, but be careful because you're
slightly low for that and can't take/deal the hits like a Troll shaman. The
Fiends don't drop decent loot, but the Bandits drop armor you can sell for
multiple platinum at the Bazaar. You can also get free Uber buffs if you hang
around the Nexus either asking Ubers or waiting for someone to offer them.

I hope you've figured out how to root and DoT your victims. That's the big
Shaman soloing technique. Root, Slow, DoT, then maybe DD if you have enough
mana. Be ready to re-root. If you get KEI in the Nexus, you can even root and
Direct Damage them to death, easily. At your level you can't cast fast enough
to use up your mana if you have KEI on. With my Troll shaman I also melee
them a bit each time (I solo yellows) just to keep my melee skills up, but
trolls are stronger and have regeneration built in. I can melee stuff my own
level without even casting on them, have always been able to.

=====
There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events, by time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be followed or legally changed, just ignored.
